H0.text: Which French author wrote the 1909 novel The Phantom Of The Opera . Victor Hugo

H1.text: Which French author wrote the 1909 novel The Phantom Of The Opera . Alexandre Dumas

H2.text: Which French author wrote the 1909 novel The Phantom Of The Opera . Gustave Flaubert

H3.text: Which French author wrote the 1909 novel The Phantom Of The Opera . G. Leroux

A4.text: Gaston Louis Alfred Leroux published his most famous work, The Phantom of the Opera, as a serial in 1909 and 1910.
